did.abstract: Briefs and correspondence relating to the Hebrew Free Burial Association, National Labor Relations Board Case AO-279. Materials were received persuant to a Freedom on Information Act request.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of briefs and correspondence relating to the Hebrew Free Burial Association, National Labor Relations Board Case AO-279. Materials were received persuant to a Freedom on Information Act request.
